title: BYD's steep EV discounting in Thailand sparks backlash, PM Srettha Thavisin seeks assurances
description: Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin told BYD Chief Executive Wang Chuanfu, who was in Thailand to mark the opening of its first Southeast Asian factory this week and paid a courtesy call to the premier on Friday, to better manage customer expectations about pricing and ensure local buyers were protected.
